column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Thank you for bringing this to our attention
column2: Karishma. We are sorry to hear about your disappointing experience while dining in with us. If you're open to it
column3: our safety team would love to speak with you about this more directly. Please click the link to fill out the corresponding information and our team will be in contact with you. Again
column4: thank you for your feedback and we greatly appreciate you bringing it to our attention. We are looking forward to hearing from you.
